response.answer_text: There are lot of theories about this Some say chanakya and kautilya were the same person while others argue that they were actually different personalities.There are two strong evidences which points that Kautilya and Chanakya were two different people. Kautilya wrote Arthashastra, and if kautilya and chanakya were same person, how come the book makes not a single reference to the Mauryan empire, its capital, Chandragupta Maurya or any other contemporary personality

Chanakya and Kautilya were same persons.He had used his another name as kautilya in Arthashastra.Or maybe at the end of Gupta empire his text were lost .So one of his followers wrote it to retain his work as in that times his followers had knew Arthashastra in their tongue byheart.Kautilya maybe Chanakyas follower
